# criblio_collector (Data Source)

Collector DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "criblio_collector" "my_collector" {
  group_id = "default"
  id       = "...my_id..."
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `group_id` (String) The consumer group to which this instance belongs. Defaults to 'default'.
- `id` (String) Unique ID to GET
